SlideBody.Heading: Analysis using Spacetrace (Contd...)
SlideBody.SubHeading: The general flow for analysis is:

List.ListItem: Using the Footprint graph to identify time instant whose live allocation we want to analyze
Input that time instant in secs in Options: Minimum seconds and Maximum timeval
Look at Top Callsite Report and Top Allocation Report
Using Options: Desired sort order? , sort by bytesize and allocation object count
Using Options: Restrict callsite backtraces to those only containing the specified text to narrow down to a single allocation point
